example.title: Real Calculation Example
example.setup: Your referral opens a Standard account and trades 10 lots of EURUSD in a month.
example.commission: Exness base IB commission: ~$10 USD per lot (40% of typical spread)
example.total: 10 lots × $10 = $100 USD to Tálamo as IB
example.note: This is a simplified calculation. Commissions vary by account type (Standard 40%, Pro/Zero/Raw 25%), spread and volume. Exness reports everything in real-time.

why.title: Why This Program Exists
why.intro: It's not marketing. It's aligned strategy.
why.point1: Tálamo grows when its community grows. Every person who enters and uses the tools professionally strengthens the entire ecosystem.
why.point2: We want those who share Tálamo to do so because they believe in the project, not because they need one more click to meet a quota.
why.point3: That's why we share 50% of commissions: if you grow by helping others enter, Tálamo grows with you. Aligned from minute one.

cta.title: Start Now
cta.description: One click. Your link. Your opportunity to grow by sharing a platform that truly adds value.

q1.question: Do I need to be a trader to participate?
q1.answer: No. You just need to share the link. Your referrals are the ones who trade. You earn from the volume they generate, without having to trade yourself.

q2.question: How much do I earn exactly?
q2.answer: 50% of the IB commission that Tálamo receives from Exness for each trade by your referrals. The base commission varies by account type (Standard 40% of spread, Pro/Zero/Raw 25%) and volume. Exness reports everything in real-time.

q3.question: How do I get paid?
q3.answer: Exness deposits directly into your agent account. Automatic daily payments. You don't have to request or claim anything. The money arrives automatically as long as your referrals trade.

q4.question: Is there a referral limit?
q4.answer: No. You can refer as many people as you want. The same link works for 1 or 1,000 referrals. No restrictions, no quotas.

q5.question: What if my referral stops trading?
q5.answer: You only earn when they trade. If they stop trading, no commission. If they resume trading later, you resume earning. Simple and transparent.
